item.title: Harmony-Pytorch
item.description:
Harmony-PyTorch is an efficient PyTorch implementation of Harmony algorithm, used for data integration and batch correction.

It has been adopted by (a GPU-accelerated single-cell analysis python package designed specific for NVIDIA devices; part of ) for its implementation on Harmony batch correction method. See .

item.title: NMF-Torch
item.description: NMF-Torch is a PyTorch implementation on Non-negative Matrix Factorization. It provides both batch and online modes for updating the matrices during computation, and aims for high efficiency.
